nodes.text: The Northern Jundland Plateau was a region in the Jundland Wastes on the planet Tatooine, located on the western edge of the area known as the Deathly Heat. During the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire, a number of wind vanes and moisture vaporators were located on the plateau, and a Jedi Knight visited the plateau to set up an ultrasonic scanner as part of an effort to locate the Shock Drum, a superweapon that generated seismic vibrations.

The Northern Jundland Plateau first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a video game released by BioWare in 2011, and is visited by the Jedi Knight class visits the area as part of the class mission "Race Against Doom." The area was pictured, though unnamed, in a map of the Jundland Wastes that appeared in the Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide.
